# PopoverAttachmentAnchor.point(_:)

**Case**

The anchor point for the popover expressed as a unit point  that describes possible alignments relative to a SwiftUI view.

## Declaration

```swift
case point(UnitPoint)
```

## Getting attachment anchors

- **PopoverAttachmentAnchor.rect(_:)**: The anchor point for the popover relative to the source’s frame.

items.description: The anchor point for the popover relative to the source’s frame.
items.name: PopoverAttachmentAnchor.rect(_:)
